sentences.en: Add a very strong fake vignette.
Martin Logan Vignette - New In Box - Authorized Dealer!
sentences.cn: 李柱铭洛根小品 - 框中新 - 授权经销商!

sentences.en: The book is an excellent vignette of some of the major debates in science.
sentences.cn: 这本书清晰而扼要地介绍了科学界的一些主要争议。

sentences.en: This vignette captures rather well the secret of Mrs Palin's appeal.
sentences.cn: 这个细节很好的表现了佩林的真实想法.

trans.tran_en: a small picture or design at the beginning or end of a book or chapter
